question: Refrigerant leakage from the compressor crankcase is prevented by ................
options: 4) Maintaining a vacuum in the crankcase

question: The successive order of 4 stroke diesel engines:
A pyrometer is normally used to measure:
Emergency generators can be stopped via ....................................
Prior to port arrival, a diesel alternator ........................... turbo alternator ............................. and all the full away procedure should be done ...........................
options: 1) Will have to be started / will be shut down / in reverse order
2) Does not have to be started / will have to be shut down / in reverse order
3) Will have to be started / will have to be started / in right order
4) Will have to be shut down / will have to be started / in reverse order
5) Doesn't have to be shut down / will have to be shut down / in right order

question: When the valves are operated ........................... on a diesel engine, they are actuated by means of cams, pushrods, rocker arms and rollers.
All details of fuel bunkering, balast handling, tank cleaning or slop disposal must be entered in the ..............................
All of the following are used for low temperature starting, except:
Lubrication oil viscosity in an operation diesel engine can be reduced by:
options: 2) Increasing the amount of lube oil
3) Decreasing the amount of cooling water

question: Watertube boilers are designed to operate within the conditions of .............
options: 3) Heavy but quick steam raiding process

question: The drains from both effects in a low pressure evaporator have their pressures equalized in the:
The instrument always used in conjunction with a salinity indicator is the:
Performance of a turbocharged engine can be improved by:
In terms of pressure and temperature, what happens to the primary refrigerant the compressor?
options: 1) Its pressure and temperature are both lowered
2) Its pressure and temperature are both raised
3) Its pressure and lowered and its temperature is raised
4) Its pressure is raised and its temperature is lowered
correctAnswer: 2) Its pressure and temperature are both raised

question: When maneuvering, you discover heavy smoke coming from the turbocharger casing. You should:
options: 1) Check the air fitler for dirty
4) Notify the bridge and ask to shut the engine down
correctAnswer: 4) Notify the bridge and ask to shut the engine down

question: The reciprocating motion of a connecting rod is transformed into a rotary motion by the.............
The purpose of the low pressure cutout switch is to:
options: 1) Maintain liquid refrigerant at the suction of the compressor
2) Maintain a preset suction pressure to the compressor
3) Cut out the compressor at a set pressure
4) Maintain compressor in at a preset temperature
5) Cut compressor in and out at a preset pressure
correctAnswer: 5) Cut compressor in and out at a preset pressure

question: A device which will function to bring an engine to a full stop in order to protect it from damage due to excessively high speed is known as a/an:
When oil is heated, it becomes ..................
The pistonheads in the engine are manufactured concave and convex shaped in order that .....................
options: 2) It will control the temperature of the engine
3) It will increase oil pressure in the engine
4) It will increase the durability of the piston
5) It will provide a powerful engine
correctAnswer: 4) It will increase the durability of the piston
